message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Given its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you for $10,000. This is a special introductory price, considering your interest and potential long-term partnership.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to engage in this discussion. In light of your counteroffer, I would like to propose a price of $9,800 for the product. This is my best offer considering the value it provides to you.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I recognize the value of your product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,600.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer the product to you for $9,700. This is my final offer, reflecting the value we both see in the product and the potential for future collaboration.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $9,650.

I'm glad we're making progress, Bob. Considering your latest counteroffer, I am willing to sell the product to you for $9,675. This is my final offer, as I believe it strikes a good balance between the value of the product and your budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on our negotiations, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,650.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After reviewing our conversation, I am willing to accept a final offer of $9,660 for the product. I believe this reflects a fair compromise between the value of the product and your budget.

Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I believe we've reached a point where both of our interests are aligned. Based on our negotiations, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $9,640.
